exceptions.summary:
Thrown when the schema is not a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BytesSchema" /> or a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" />
            with logical type <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" />.
Thrown when no conversion from <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> exists.
